column4: I am trying to isntall gnome3 but I got this message in the terminal: E: Unable to locate package gnome-desktop3
what version of ubuntu?
10.10 Meerkat
http://www.omgubuntu.co.uk/2010/11/install-vanilla-gnome-3-in-maverick/
I think that I have tried installing it using natty tutorials !! sorry and thank you.
no problem, report back w/ success and/or other issues :)
I got the same message: E: Unable to locate package gnome-desktop3
try sudo apt-get install gnome3-session
I have isntalled this, sudo apt-get install gnome3-session
have you logged out and back in
It works! thank you. :)
np
I am trying to change the visual effects but there is a message telling me that it can't be changed because mutter is running!
the session is only shipping w/ core components right now.
And how can I install the full gnome3?
not available yet. see !latest
Why I can't install gnome3?
you did
Unable to locate package, it is just a session right?
I can't activate the visual effects.
gnome3 is brand new. it will take time to get packages updated and officially released.
Thank you for explaining this. :)
